short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends the css editor in the left tab in the carrot design page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever open up the css editor in carrot.com and think, "man, I sure with this editor was larger than 184 pixels tall!!!" 
If the answer is yes, then this is the extension for you! It takes the measly little editor window, and extends it to fill the empty gray space.

After downloading the Carrot CSS tab extender; Enable it, Head over to your carrot account on carrot.com > go to your sites dashboard > then design. And voilÃ ! The css tab is now actually usable ğŸ˜ƒ.
